alert.note: Alert for Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 15 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Nassau and northeastern Duval Counties through 215 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Cisco Gardens, or near Jacksonville International Arpt, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jacksonville, Jacksonville International Arpt, Oceanway, Cisco Gardens and Nassau Village-Ratliff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Duval; Coastal Nassau; Inland Nassau; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Duval
